name: RGB (Erick1310)
description:
RGB is a 3-players game in which the first player to cover the screen of his color WINS!.

To win you must press the corresponding key of your player until you cover the entire screen.

CONTROLS:

  • R- for the red circle.
  • G- for the green circle.
  • B- for the blue circle.

This is the first game I publish and the first game jam in which I participate, so all the feedback is welcome :D.

Thanks for reading and playing my games!.
